大家好，

台灣研發管理經理人協會辦理「ICEA國際ESG稽核師」認證輔導課程，敬邀本校教職員生報名參加。課程內容詳閱隨信附件。意者請自行報名參加。謝謝。

網址連結：https://www.rd.org.tw/news/450-2023-11-23

Dear all,

The Taiwan R & D Managers Association is organizing the "ICEA International ESG Auditor" course with the certification. Please find detailed course information in the attached document. If you are interested, please register on your own. Thank you very much.

Have a nice day.
